subject: Music
subcategory: The History of Rock and Roll
title: The Roots of Rock
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Roots of Rock.

hook.text: Rock and roll was born when blues, gospel, and country crashed into each other.

buildup.text: African American blues gave rock its soul. Country gave it twang. Gospel gave it fire.

discovery.text: In the early 1950s, artists blended these sounds into something raw and electric.

twist.text: White radio stations refused to play it â€” so kids tuned into Black radio instead.

climax.text: A generation discovered music their parents hated, and a cultural revolution began.

punchline.text: Rock was born rebellious. It never really grew up.

quiz.question: What musical genres combined to create rock and roll?
